name: Malavi
author: uladzimirkulesh
description: Malavi is an easy-to-use WordPress theme inspired by simplicity. With block patterns, which allow you to create a beautiful layout in a matter of seconds, this themeâ€™s colors and eye-catching design will let your work shine. Whether you want to build a complex or incredibly simple website, you can do it quickly and intuitively through the bundled styles or dive into creation and full customization yourself.
